鵗字的基本解释

鵗
xī
野鸡。

鵗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》香衣切，平微，曉。］
北方出产的雉。

鵗字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵗； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1490第20
【廣韻】香衣切【集韻】【韻會】香依切，?音希。北方雉名。【爾雅·釋鳥】北方曰鵗。又官名。【左傳·昭十七年】五雉爲五工正。【註】北方曰鵗雉，攻皮之工也。又【集韻】【韻會】?展几切，音黹。義同。

鵗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鵗字的起名意思

暂无。

鵗
Basic explanation of words
鵗
xī
pheasant.
鵗
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Fragrant clothes cut, flat and small, Xiao. ]
Pheasants from the north.
鵗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵗; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1490 and 20
[Guangyun] Xiangyiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Xiangyiqie,? Yinxi. Northern pheasant name. [Erya·Shiniao] The north is called 鵗. Also official name. [Zuo Zhuan·17th Year of Zhao] The five pheasants are Wu Gongzheng. [Note] The north is called the pheasant, the work of attacking the skin. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Show a few cuts, the sound. The same meaning.
